title: If the US is having a coin shortage, where are all the coins? - Quora
tags: Money in the United States of America

response.answer_text: In order to practice CoVid safety measures the US Mint has had to reduce its output of coins. This means smaller allotments are going to banks, and then from banks to stores. As with everything else these days as soon as there is any word of a shortage of anything it is made worse by hoarding behaviour. One thing there will never be a shortage of is fools
